actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning the illegality of kidnapping American citizens.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) anyone who attempts to kidnap a person in the United States for the purpose of bringing such person to trial abroad should be deemed to have committed a crime in the United States and dealt with accordingly; (2) the United States should vigorously pursue drug traffickers and any person involved in the murder of U.S. Drug Enforcement Agency officials through the existing international legal framework, including extradition treaties; and (3) U.S. officials should refrain from committing the crime of kidnapping.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning the illegality of kidnapping American citizens.
